title: 30,000 Visitors Locked Inside Shanghai Disneyland For Hours By Chinese Government After 1 Positive Covid Case
content:
1. 30,000 Visitors Locked Inside Shanghai Disneyland For Hours By Chinese Government After 1 Positive Covid Case  Deadline
  2. COVID-19 scare forces Shanghai Disney into lockdown after woman tests positive l ABC7  ABC7
  3. Shanghai's Halloween Lockdown Becomes a Disney Nightmare as 30000 Are Detained in Theme Park Virus Scare  The Daily Beast
  4. China Locks 30,000 Visitors Inside Shanghai Disneyland After One Guest Got Covid-19  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Shanghai Disneyland is shut down, and 30000 people are tested, after one COVID case  NPR

localize.title: 中国政府が上海ディズニーランドに3万人の来場者を数時間閉じ込めた結果、コビット陽性反応が1件発生
中国政府将3万名游客锁在上海迪士尼乐园内数小时，原因是发生了一起阳性的科威德病例
中國政府將3萬名遊客鎖在上海迪士尼樂園內數小時，原因是發生了一起陽性的科威德病例
